thread.title: Halbert Cupps
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Halbert Cupps

author: Halbert Cupps
title: Halbert Cupps
text: I've shopped At Gardner White for many years. It's not the prices that keep me coming back. Let's face it there are many less expensive alternatives. I come back because it is always a wonderful and positive experience from choosing products all the way through delivery and set up. It is always a pleasure doing business With Gardner White!
